"Barn Burning." The child, terrified at being questioned by the judge, feels "as if he had swung outward at the end of a grape vine, over a ravine, and at the top of the swing had been caught in a prolonged instant of mesmerized gravity, weightless in time." When the plaintiff declines the query, "time, the fluid world, rushed beneath him again..." (5)
